fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink - Phone Vibrate is not implemented

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to BaseUI --> window(standalone).
3. Launch the test traditional modal.
4. A modal window will open with vibrate & close buttons.
5. Tap on vibrate button. 

h5.Actual Result:
1. Tapping on vibrate button does not vibrate the device.

h5.Expected Result:
1. Tapping on vibrate button should vibrate the device.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink : BaseUI -> Windows(Standalone) -> traditional modal ; tapping on vibrate button does not vibrate device.
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appc Studio : 3.2.3.201403250634

Kitchensink from studio (3.2.2)

comments.body: Placing these items on hold for the moment based on community interest.
Closing ticket as BlackBerry is no longer supported by us.
